attributes.action: Put Lady Godiva on the back of the five pound note
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lady Godiva was a great hero of our country, and by common consent (originally from the Cockney slang) a five pound note is known as a Lady Godiva.
It seems only fitting that such a hero of our nation should be commemorated properly by taking her place on currency.
